reason.raw: Make a new one with ignition transport services
reason.html: Make a new one with ignition transport services

description.raw:
* First iteration of gsoc plugins project. Attached plugins of models displayed in world tab.

* Created subtree with filename, innerxml, updated comments, added plugin to test and ModelToSDF() function.

* reverted msgs to standard PluginToSDF() function.

* updated changelog.

* changed innerxml test.

* first draft with plugin type error message.

* fill pluginMsg implemented. Response not receiving data.

* Add Property Box for Plugins. Change info to model_plugin

* Removed qDebug() code lines.

* update comments

* corrected Qt::Flags warning and integrated feedback from louise. std::mutex receiveMutex on my system not able to compile, pls check.

* fix build, add some doxygen, cleanup some spaces, simplify Model::OnRequest

* fix test

* Close branch attach_plugins_louise

* test for model plugins. still fails.

* added URI to test uniqueness of model plugins. Test still fails.

* tweaks to test and URI usage

* Close branch attach_plugins_louise

* sensor msg can not be serialized it seems.

* implemented sensor properties + uniqueness with uris. Added test, fails.
